title: My Beautiful Witch - Novel Updates
tags: Aristocracy   Beautiful Female Lead   Charming Protagonist   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Maids   Nobles   R-18   R*pe
author: 발기해서생긴일
description:
A new maid in the castle of Duke Arsene As they enter, the men inside the castle are buzzing. This is because a new maid named Irene, despite her lowly origin, sheds her outstanding beauty and strange charm. Eventually, violent men in the castle try to approach Irene, who works alone, and force her to commit it. Duke Arsene, who was walking around the castle, found Irene who had collapsed after being r*ped. The duke, who pursues fairness, finds the criminals who r*ped her and punishes them severely. Just as the case was about to end, the Duke suddenly calls Irene and orders her to leave the castle.

A woman of strange charm, rumored to be a descendant of a witch. Despicable men rush to her like beasts. A peac*ck emerged from such a crisis.>
